articles.title: DuckDuckGo chief says Google contract stopped deal with Apple - ETBrandEquity
articles.description: A redacted transcript unsealed late on Wednesday showed DuckDuckGo had struck a deal with Apple in 2014 to be shown as an option on Apple devices. Soon after, DuckDuckGo began pressing Apple to be made the default choice for users who wanted to work in privac…
